Package com.nrg948.dashboard

Class DashboardServer

java.lang.Object
com.nrg948.dashboard.DashboardServer
public final class DashboardServer extends Object
Utility class for starting and stopping the dashboard web server.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    registerTab(TabBinding tab, String... modes)
    Registers a tab for which its data is published for the specified modes.
    static void
    registerTab(Optional<TabBinding> tab, String... modes)
    Registers a tab for which its data is published for the specified modes if the tab is present.
    static void
    setMode(String mode)
    Sets the current mode of the dashboard, which determines which tabs are active and have their data published.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public static Closeable start(TimedRobot robot)
      Starts the dashboard configuration web server and automatically updating the data bindings.

      NOTE: This method defaults to the "Dashboard" mode, which may not be appropriate for all robots. If you want to start the server in a different mode, use the start(TimedRobot, String) method instead.

      Parameters:
      robot - The TimedRobot instance.
      Returns:
      A Closeable that stops the web server when closed.

    • start

      public static Closeable start(TimedRobot robot, String mode)
      Starts the dashboard configuration web server and automatically updating the data bindings.
      Parameters:
      robot - The TimedRobot instance.
      mode - The mode to set when starting the server, which determines the tabs that are active and have their data published.
      Returns:
      A Closeable that stops the web server when closed.

    • registerTab

      public static void registerTab(TabBinding tab, String... modes)
      Registers a tab for which its data is published for the specified modes.
      Parameters:
      tab - The TabBinding instance to register.
      modes - The modes in which the tab data is published.

    • registerTab

      public static void registerTab(Optional<TabBinding> tab, String... modes)
      Registers a tab for which its data is published for the specified modes if the tab is present.
      Parameters:
      tab - The Optional TabBinding instance to register.
      modes - The modes in which the tab data is published.

    • setMode

      public static void setMode(String mode)
      Sets the current mode of the dashboard, which determines which tabs are active and have their data published.
      Parameters:
      mode - The mode to set.
